amendment.description: To provide additional funding for the Impact Aid Program.

action.text: Amendment SA 1553 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1553 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 42. Record Vote Number: 323.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1553.
Amendment SA 1553 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11009-11015, S11017; text: CR S11009) To provide additional funding for the Impact Aid Program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1553 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 42. Record Vote Number: 323.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1553 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 1542.
